name: The Legend of Grozun
description:
IMPORTANT NOTE RE: '4-COLOR GAME JAM' - For some reason when replaying the game, some of the options already chosen in a previous play through change colour (Purple). I literally have no idea why this happens, but the game was built using only 4 colours (Black, White, Grey, Red). I will try to fix this in the future (if possible).

See below for controls.

Humanity is on the back-foot. Demon-Kind has almost completed its global conquest, and it is your mission to secure its victory. Disguised as a human, infiltrate the human 'Centre for Demon Intelligence',  destroying intel, and weakening the human forces. However, avoid being discovered - the balance of global domination lies in your hands.

Note: Try fullscreen if sizing issues! Controls: Mouse only. You can reload the game from the conclusion screen.

I had a corrupted file halfway through development (& several other issues with Unity), so had to build from scratch in a new engine (Twine). So there are some missing features that I wanted to implement but wasn't sure how (it was my first time using Twine). Either way, I hope you enjoy, and make sure to leave a comment and a rating!
